name: Lost Woods (PnDAA)
description:
Authors

- Dev: SAÜL Matthieu
- Art: Anubis https://www.instagram.com/anubis_the_sleepwalker/
- Music: DUFOUR Florian https://soundcloud.com/flodufour-1
- Sounds: CALABRESE Quentin, SAÜL Nicolas

Description

You are a child lost in the woods. You want to get out of them.

Controls

Arrows / asdw: Move
space: Action (not combat related)
R: reset
